titleStmt.title: A short ansvver to a whole litter of libels by Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for Hen. Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library, Cambridge University Library and Harvard University Library.
